name: Dashing Sky
description:
First time doing a game jam in solo and first time with Unity 2D, was here to try this software and have some fun.

Controller supported.

Left click / RT : Boost

How does your submission match the theme?

You have to boost to the finish line in a limited time. The longest you are boosting the faster you will go. During this state you can destroy ennemies (red ball) for keeping the boosting state.

Third-party resources 

Unity 5.5 and Gimp.

Contributors

Just me.
